sentences.tranLocal: (= more than any other things ) she was seeking love.

sentences.tran: 如果我不能以画画谋生的话，至少我能教别人画画。
sentences.tranLocal: If I can't make a living at painting, at least I can teach someone else to paint.

sentences.tran: 在那些漫长的旅途中我们别无他事可做。
sentences.tranLocal: We had nothing else to do on those long trips.

phrases.tran: 其他所有人；其他每个人
没有别的东西；没有别的事情

trans.tranLocal: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is

sentences.tran: 谁锁的门？
sentences.tranLocal: Who locked the door?

sentences.tran: 你为谁工作？
sentences.tranLocal: Who do you work for?

sentences.tran: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？
sentences.tranLocal: Who’s that guy with your wife?

sentences.tran: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。
sentences.tranLocal: They never found out who the murderer was.

sentences.tran: 她不知道是谁送的花。
sentences.tranLocal: She wondered who had sent the flowers.

trans.tranLocal: a word meaning at any time; used mostly in questions, negatives, comparisons, or sentences with ‘if’

sentences.tran: 似乎从来没有什么事情会使他烦恼。
sentences.tranLocal: Nothing ever seems to upset him.

sentences.tran: 你去过巴黎吗？
sentences.tranLocal: Have you ever been to Paris?

sentences.tran: 我觉得我以前从未到过这里。
sentences.tranLocal: I don’t think I’ve ever been here before.

sentences.tran: 如果你什么时候到了西雅图，就来看我吧。
sentences.tranLocal: If you’re ever in Seattle, come and see me.

trans.tran: 从而，因此；在那附近；在那方面
trans.tranLocal: with the result that something else happens

sentences.tran: 我们的身体会流汗，由此能通过蒸发散热。
sentences.tranLocal: Our bodies can sweat, thereby losing heat by evaporation.

list.tran: 在那里；在那边；在那点上
在那上面，在其上；…之后立即

trans.tranLocal: a special name, sign, or word that is marked on a product to show that it is made by a particular company, that cannot be used by any other company

sentences.tran: 条纹T恤衫成了这位喜剧演员的标记。
sentences.tranLocal: The striped T-shirt became the comedian’s trademark.

phrases.tran: 商标侵权；侵犯商标专用权

trans.tranLocal: a country, area etc that is poor and where there is not much modern industry

sentences.tran: 肾脏先天发育不全的婴儿
sentences.tranLocal: a baby born with underdeveloped kidneys

phrases.tran: 不发达国家，发展中国家（等于developing country）

list.tran: 不发达；[摄] 显影不足
使发展不完全；使显影不足

trans.tran: 更新；校正，修正；使现代化
trans.tranLocal: to add the most recent information to something
a change or addition to a computer file so that it has the most recent information

sentences.tran: 这些档案需要更新。
sentences.tranLocal: The files need updating.

trans.tranLocal: to make a computer, machine, or piece of software better and able to do more things

sentences.tran: 这家酒店最近重新装修过，设施更加完善了。
sentences.tranLocal: The hotel has recently been refurbished and upgraded.

trans.tranLocal: standing or sitting straight up

sentences.tran: 凯蒂还醒着，坐得笔直，眼睛盯着电视。
sentences.tranLocal: Katie was still awake, sitting bolt upright(= sitting with her back very straight ) staring at the television.

trans.tranLocal: including all the latest information

sentences.tran: …今日有关食品的最新消息。
sentences.tranLocal: ...the most up-to-date information available on foods today.

trans.tranLocal: not allowing water to enter

sentences.tran: 防水上衣
sentences.tranLocal: a waterproof jacket

sentences.tran: 防水黏合剂
sentences.tranLocal: waterproof adhesive

sentences.tran: 在鞋子上抹点蜡使其防水。
sentences.tranLocal: Rub the wax in to make the shoe waterproof.

trans.tranLocal: that does not allow water to get in or out

sentences.tran: 不漏水的容器
sentences.tranLocal: a watertight container

trans.tran: 健康， 幸福； 福利
trans.tranLocal: a feeling of being comfortable, healthy, and happy

sentences.tran: 唱歌能产生一种幸福感。
sentences.tranLocal: Singing can create a sense of well-being.

trans.tran: 众所周知的， 著名的
trans.tranLocal: known by a lot of people

sentences.tran: 这可能是他们最有名的歌曲。
sentences.tranLocal: This is probably their best-known song.

sentences.tran: 著名的电视节目主持人
sentences.tranLocal: a well-known TV presenter

trans.tran: 然而， 但是， 尽管
trans.tranLocal: used to say that although something is true of one thing, it is not true of another

sentences.tran: 旧系统相当复杂，而新系统却很简单。
sentences.tranLocal: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.

sentences.tran: 这个城市花了十亿美元建造博物馆和体育馆，但是却忽略了对学校的建设。
sentences.tranLocal: Whereas the city spent over $1 billion on its museums and stadium, it failed to look after its schools.

trans.tranLocal: in, at, or to another place

sentences.tran: 她在澳大利亚和其他地方渐渐出名了。
sentences.tranLocal: She is becoming famous in Australia and elsewhere.

sentences.tran: 喀拉拉邦的犯罪和酗酒现象少于印度的其他地区。
sentences.tranLocal: Kerala has less crime and alcoholism than elsewhere in India.

trans.tran: 谁； 无论谁； 究竟是谁
trans.tranLocal: used to say that it does not matter who does something, is in a particular place etc

sentences.tran: 谁想去我就带谁去。
sentences.tranLocal: I’ll take whoever wants to go.

sentences.tran: 你看完书以后，就给克里斯廷或谢利，或者随便谁都行。
sentences.tranLocal: When you’re done with the book, just give it to Kristin or Shelley or whoever.
